title: The power of non-verbal hypnosis with Dr. Marco Paret / Mesmerismus®
description:
Dr. Marco Paret's students demonstrate the incredible power of non-verbal hypnosis on his masterclass. His student used Animal magnetism and the subject's body reacted strongly, moving back and forth, depending on the hypnotist's moves. Dr. Paret teaches the power of the gaze - Fascination and Mesmerism, from the ancient traditions. Waking up from the deep hypnotic experiences, the subjects feel transformed and liberated. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
